summary:
Fixes the dwemer cup texture.

Also, other dwemer misc items, such as dwemer plates, bowls , etc, may look better as well (They all use a common texture).
descriptionHtml:
Fixes the dwemer cup texture.

Also, other dwemer misc items, such as dwemer plates, bowls , etc, may look better as well (They all use a common texture).

This is not included in SMIM (as of v1.20), which is why I made it. 

Hopefully Brumbek (the author of SMIM) makes an improved dwemer cup sometime soon.
If someone can do a better job, Please do.

By: Ayhay123
author: Ayhay123
